AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol Agent David: Agent who conducted the investigatory stop of Carlos Martinez-Romero and testified as a witness, with four years of experience, specializing in detecting smuggling operations
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.the crew-cab truck used by Carlos Martin: Vehicle stopped by United States Border Patrol Agent David Fitzgerald during an investigatory stop, modified with no backseat, indicative of potential smuggling of illegal aliens or narcotics
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.the trial court in the case of Carlos Ma: Court where Carlos Martinez-Romero was found guilty of possession and sentenced to seven years imprisonment, and where the credibility of witnesses at suppression hearings is judged
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Carlos Martinez-Romero: Defendant in a marijuana possession case, driver of the crew-cab truck, arguing against the credibility of Agent David Fitzgerald's testimony
